Quick question. How will his "Disc of the sun" work in Dominion?
We currently have no good solution for this on the Crystal Scar. You'll get Will of the Emperor but not Disc of the Sun. This is something I'd like to look at soon as we get the time for it.

You guys just released Gnar and already announced this guy? I am impressed, I feel like I'm back in season one with a champ every 2 weeks. Bravo, I am incredibly pumped. #Hype
No stops on the hype train... But yeah, we're excited about him! Should be a lot of fun.

Upvote so we can get this quote! "Nasus is but a mere puppy"

Wow... I was just reading a bunch of comments from Riot saying that they were disappointed how this concept didn't work a few years ago and they revisited it with no avail... Suddenly "GOTCHA! HE'S COMING OUT NOW!"

Rito confirmed for trolls. {{champion:48}}
This guy went through a whole bunch of kits before we happened on one that worked.
I would love if you could make a Dev Blog going through the different kits and why they did not work.
"Ao Shin just 3 more champs away guys!" - Riot Games, 7 champions ago.
Im shocked they are revealing a new champ so soon after the release of gnar. Its a good thing and I hope that riot keeps up with this kind of quick releases.

Eeeeeeh, I'd rather not. I was around when they went through a couple of months where a new champ was coming out every other week. It became overdone and resulted in a number of champs that were either underpowered or far too overpowered because of a lack of proper testing time.

For the sake of *Clarity!*, the soldiers he summons should be called Sentinels, not soldiers. They're tied intrinsically to position and essentially more like guards or sentries. Also, let's be honest... it sounds cooler. Edit: Yes, I know they can move (ONCE in their lifetime) but once they do, they're simply guarding a new area. Still a sentinel, just a new post.
Like Sand Sentinels -> Sandtienls -> Sandenls -> Sandels or SANDALS?!. EUREKA! We will call them sandals!
Half life 3 confirmed
If there's no references to Darude Sandstorm with this champion's taunts, I will be thoroughly disappointing in all the Rito staff.
